review: Received my fire stick for Christmas and let's just say by far it has been the best gift ever.  I really enjoy catching up on some few older HBO and showtime series, like that I can purchase movies rather than go out and rent, and enjoy all the free movies as well.  Since I did not do netlike or even possess cable this stick is great for me since it connects with my wi-fi making it easy fro me to keep my bills down when I travel a lot.  I recommend  the fire stick to anyone plus its so easy to install trust me anyone can set it up and it takes all of 30 seconds.
